name: Nguzo Saba Typer
description:
My submission for PDub's Nguzo Saba-themed holiday game jam 2021

This is a typing game; you type the names of the Nguzo Saba symbols as they appear on screen before they reach the ground. The length of each symbol name is added to your score as you enter correctly-spelled names. A symbol reaching the bottom of the screen causes you to lose lifepoints. When you run out of life points, the game is over!

The window resolution is fixed at 800x600 because I'm lazy lol

Source Code is available for those interested:

https://github.com/williamblair/nguzosabatyper
